page.description: A component with Panel Cards that can be accessed using keyboard shortcuts.

discussion.p: This example shows how keyboard shortcuts can be implemented for the active panel.

section.title: Videos
section.description: To learn more about Keyboard Shortcuts in the UX Component, watch the videos below:

videos.title: Adding Keyboard Shortcuts to a Component
videos.description: In this video we show how you can add support for keyboard shortcuts to a UX component. Keyboard shortcuts can speed up a user's interaction with a component. For example, you could configure the Ctrl-S key as a shortcut for saving the data in the a UX.

see.ref: How to add Keyboard Shortcuts to a Tabbed UI Interface
